questions.name: required-items
questions.label: Please confirm the following:
options: I have read and agree to the [MLH Code of Conduct](https://static.mlh.io/docs/mlh-code-of-conduct.pdf)
I agree to the [HackGT Photo Release Waiver](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1fqD6JKk3sRiE8W0FLEGqahfXOfDvQepV/view?usp=sharing)

I authorize you to share my application/registration information with Major League Hacking for event administration, ranking, and MLH administration in-line with the [MLH Privacy Policy](https://mlh.io/privacy). I further agree to the terms of both the [MLH Contest Terms and Conditions](https://github.com/MLH/mlh-policies/tree/master/prize-terms-and-conditions) and the [MLH Privacy Policy](https://mlh.io/privacy).
I authorize MLH to send me pre- and post-event informational emails, which contain free credit and opportunities from their partners

questions.name: other
questions.label: Anything else you'd like us to know?

text.content: Thank your confirming your attendance to HackGTeeny 2021!
Authorization to Share Data with Sponsors

questions.name: gdpr
questions.label: If you would like us to provide our sponsors with information about you, please opt-in by checking the box below.  You can change your decision later on by emailing us at [hello@hack.gt.](mailto:hello@hack.gt)
options: I authorize HackGT to share my application, registration, and event attendance data with HackGT's corporate sponsors and partners.

questions.name: additional-info
questions.label: Is there anything you'd like us to know?

text.content: Due to Institute policy, minors (under 18) who are not students at Georgia Tech may not attend HackGTeeny 2020.

questions.name: 18-and-gt-student
questions.label: Are you over 18 or a student at Georgia Tech?
options: I am under 18 and a Georgia Tech student.

questions.name: required-items
questions.label: Please confirm the following:
options: I have read and agree to the [MLH Code of Conduct](https://static.mlh.io/docs/mlh-code-of-conduct.pdf). I further agree to the terms of both the [MLH Contest Terms and Conditions](https://github.com/MLH/mlh-policies/tree/master/prize-terms-and-conditions) and the [MLH Privacy Policy](https://mlh.io/privacy).
I agree to the [HackGT Photo Release Waiver](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1lU5C_BMFYWBRestPELWVuiKK_0dqVo4S/view?usp=sharing)

I authorize you to share my application/registration information with Major League Hacking for event administration, ranking, and MLH administration in-line with the [MLH Privacy Policy](https://mlh.io/privacy)
I authorize Major League Hacking to send me occasional messages about hackathons including pre- and post-event informational emails.
